SELECT AA.BIZ_REG_ID , AA.BIZ_REG_NO , AA.BIZ_NAME , AA.REP_NAME , AA.BIZ_TYPE , AA.BIZ_ITEM , AA.REMARKS , AA.USE_YN , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
, AA.ADDRESS_ID , AD.POST_NO , AD.ZONE_NO , AD.ADDRESS1 , AD.ADDRESS2
FROM UCD.BIZ_REG_CE AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.ADDRESS AD WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ADDRESS_ID = AD.ADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.BIZ_REG_NO LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.BIZ_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' )
AND AA.BIZ_REG_ID = #BIZ_REG_ID#
ORDER BY AA.BIZ_NAME

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS BIZ_REG_ID
